      • loadFileMapFromFolder

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,FileInfoPath> loadFileMapFromFolder(java.io.File folder)
        Scans the given directory and returns a map of pairs.
        Parameters:
        folder - The folder to be scanned
        Returns:
        A map of the metadata (FileInfo) of all the files recursively found in the given folder and its subdirectories.

      • loadFilesFromFolder

        public static FileInfo[] loadFilesFromFolder(java.lang.String sharedFolderPath)
        Scans the given directory and returns an array of FileInfo objects, one for each file recursively found in the given folder and its subdirectories.
        Parameters:
        sharedFolderPath - The folder to be scanned
        Returns:
        An array of file metadata (FileInfo) of all the files found

      • removeLocalFilesFromFileList

        public static FileInfo[] removeLocalFilesFromFileList(FileInfo[] fileList)
        Filters the given list of files, removing those shared by this peer (both complete files and files that are being downloaded)
        Parameters:
        fileList - The full list of files returned by the tracker
        Returns:
        The list of remote files for this peer (not shared this peer)
